## registerFastifyRoutes() function

Регистрация маршрутов для Fastify

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function registerFastifyRoutes(app: FastifyInstance, settings: ISigmaOtpSDKControllersSettings, sigmaOtpSdk: SigmaOtpSDK): void;
```

**Returns:**

void

## Example


```typescript
import fastify from 'fastify';
import { registerFastifyRoutes } from '../controllers/fastify.controller';

const app = fastify();

registerFastifyRoutes(app, {
// settings
});
const start = async () => {
   try {
     await app.listen({ port: 3000 });
     console.log('Server running on port 3000');
   } catch (err) {
     app.log.error(err);
     process.exit(1);
   }
};

start();
```
